short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automated task creation for Azure DevOps work items

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension enables the automatic submission of tasks to the ADO tracking system.

The amount of tasks created for a certain item (PBI/Bug, etc.) can be changed, and patterns for unique names can be used (e.g. parent item title, id, etc.).

Enter your public token, organization, and project information in the Settings tab to get started.
